amendment.description: To require the authorization of appropriation of amounts for the development of new or modified nuclear weapons.

action.text: SA 2842 fell when SA 2366 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Motion to table amendment SA 2842 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 121.

Amendment SA 2842 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 2366. (consideration: CR S3748; text: CR S3748) To require the authorization of appropriation of amounts for the development of new or modified nuclear weapons.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2842 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 121.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2842 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 2366.
